name: Example simulator for production and spreading of fire over land units
description: This simulator simulate the dynamics of fuel stock decreasing during fire, based on wind speed and stock type.It also performs the propagation of the head of the fire using landscapes connections

used.name: ignitionunits
used.description: semicolon separated list of land units IDs where the fire ignites

required.name: stockini
required.description: Initial stock quantity available on the land unit

required.name: landcover
required.description: Land cover code for the land unit

produced.name: fire.surf.Q.stocklevel
produced.description: Quantity of stock remaining on the land unit

produced.name: fire.surf.Q.stockratio
produced.description: Ratio of stock remaining on the land unit
